Content-Length: 1033

Quasar:




Quasar turned and snapped to attention from Megatron's command over 
comm-link. "Yes, sir." she said. "I'll be there." It would be her 
first battle, perhaps something she looked forward to. Every loyal 
Predacon would be anticipating it. 

"I'm going to help the others," she said to who ever was left in the 
cave and turned to the door. She pulled it open with effort and 
closed it behind. He looked out and charged off after Tankor's 
tracks. 

She was a fast bot with her slim frame, long legs, and light-weight. 
She kept herself in motion until she got to the battle zone. Battle. 
What Predacons were made for.

She stopped, shin high in the snow, the awful stuff. Many bots were 
caught in battle. 

Instincts turned on. She withdrew a large plasma rifle from behind 
her armor. She had examined her weapons earlier. She looked over, 
spotting a bot that wasn't from her team. She raised it, aiming at 
Dollen.

She fired. The blast was so strong, it knocked her off her feet with 
a short squeal, on her back.
